Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix
  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents any matrix with real numbers (in practice we can only represent rational numbers). The class is backed by a two-dimensional array of doubles.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jack Smalligan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Matrix()
      Constructs a Matrix with 1 row, one column, and the element 0.0
      Matrix​(double[][] matrix)
      Constructs a matrix with the given data in it
      Matrix​(int[][] matrix)
      Constructs a matrix with the given data in it
      Matrix​(int r, int c)
      Constructs the zero matrix with r rows and c columns

      • createEchelonForm

        public static Matrix createEchelonForm​(Matrix input)
        This will create and return an echelon form of the given matrix, without modifying the input's contents
        Parameters:
        input - a Matrix whose echelon form is to be found
        Returns:
        an echelon form of input

      • getRREF

        public static Matrix getRREF​(Matrix input)
        Given a matrix as an input, it will find that matrix's reduced row echelon form, returning that as a new matrix
        Parameters:
        input - a Matrix whose reduced row echelon form is to be found
        Returns:
        the reduced row echelon form of input

        Get the column in which the leading entry is located
        Parameters:
        r - the row in which to find the leading entry's column
        Returns:
        the column where the leading entry occurs in this row, if one exists, -1 otherwise.

      • getMinor

        public static Matrix getMinor​(int i,
                              int j,
                              Matrix mat)
        Creates the (i, j) minor of a given matrix
        Parameters:
        i - the row to be excluded
        j - the column to be excluded
        mat - the matrix to find the minor of
        Returns:
        the (i, j) minor of mat. Note that this method will return a SquareMatrix if rows = columns
